topic.title: I don't get anything to the new internet
topic.body:
Should I become a nerd to just be free on internet ?
I'm using the android app and it's not so user friendly. I have a username, but no password (?). I can't connect to zerome nor zeroboard. 

This solution could be great if it would be more user friendly.

topic.title: Are we fully anonymous
topic.body: I send a mail to somebody, can i be tracked down?
